item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 26, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

6. Cancellation of Naval Academy Lecture by Ruth Ben-Ghiat Threatens Inst. Autonomy (26 points | 2 comments)

8. Adventures in algorithmic trading on the Runescape Grand Exchange (82 points | 7 comments)

10. Mdx – Execute Your Markdown Code Blocks, Now in Go (29 points | 8 comments)
11. Universal optimality of Dijkstra via beyond-worst-case heaps (161 points | 36 comments)
12. Detecting when LLMs are uncertain (230 points | 141 comments)

14. Pygfx (194 points | 32 comments)
15. OmniParser for Pure Vision Based GUI Agent (113 points | 18 comments)
